import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import enTranslations from"./jazyky/en.json";import czTranslations from"./jazyky/cz.json";// Translations
var resources={en:{translation:enTranslations},cz:{translation:czTranslations}};i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:resources,lng:"en",// Default language
fallbackLng:"en",// Fallback language
interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
